  • sgSystemStart :: !UTCTime

  • sgMaxKESEvolutions :: !Word64

  • sgMaxLovelaceSupply :: !Word64

  • sgGenDelegs :: !(Map (KeyHash 'Genesis c) (GenDelegPair c))
  • sgInitialFunds :: ListMap (Addr c) Coin
  • sgStaking :: ShelleyGenesisStaking c
}
